EmailTemplate.description: Second email to dealers still on GSI with instructions on switching A record to EdgeCast IP Address
EmailTemplate.name: DNS Migration Email #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Immediate Action Required for VinSolutions Websites
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued Website Client,
You are receiving this message because the DNS settings on your VinSolutions website(s) are set to expire and must be modified ASAP in order to avoid any interruption in service with your website.
Migrating to this new DNS record will not only help you to avoid a service interruption, but will also improve your VinSolutions website(s) load times making your site perform faster.
You can complete the migration process using the easy step-by-step instruction found here:
http://vinsolutions.com/dns.aspx
Please make the change by November 11th to avoid any service interruption.
For any questions regarding this process, please contact your assigned Website Account Manager or call the Help Desk @ 1-800-980-7488, Option #1.
We appreciate your support in our efforts to continually improve the dealer experience!
Sincerely,
Your Team at VinSolutions
